message: Let's be fair and close the deal now.
I understand you want to be fair, but my turn to propose.  This is a reasonable offer considering the circumstances.
Considering the inflation, my share should be higher. Let's settle this.
The inflation only affects me, Alice. I'm willing to settle for my previous offer, but this is my final one.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is on my side.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome now. Take it or leave it.
You should have taken my previous offers. Inflation is killing your share.
